#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

#define lli long long
#define pb push_back

double f(double x,double n){
    double tmp = pow((double)x/100,n);
    tmp = (double)1-tmp;
    double ans = x*tmp;
    return ans;
}

double solve(int n){
    double l=0,r=100;
    for(int i=0; i<200; i++) {
        double l1 = (l*2+r)/3;
        double l2 = (l+2*r)/3;
        if(f(l1,n) > f(l2,n))
            r = l2;
        else l = l1;
    }
    return l;
}

int main(){
    int t,n;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--){
        scanf("%d",&n);
        double ans = solve(n);
        printf("%.7lf\n",ans);
    }
    return 0;
}
